name: wizardly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
of, like, or relating to a wizard (= a man who is believed to have magical powers) : The showman used his wizardly magic to make his assistant disappear from the cabinet. As a teacher, she has a wizardly gift for getting her students to pay attention and apply themselves to the work.
More examplesFewer examplesHe has a wizardly ability to turn any random ingredients into a delicious, satisfying meal. Since you are so good with computers, maybe you can use your wizardly powers to make this error message go away.
